title: Gannett 's revenue 2013 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 3.17 was reported at Year 2014
Minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 2.89 was reached at Year 2015
